55.eng-name: The Book of Zuhd and Softening of Hearts

hadiths.text: Abu Sa'id Khudri reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said:Do not take down anything from me, and he who took down anything from me except the Qur'an, he should efface that and narrate from me, for there is no harm in it and he who attributed any falsehood to me-and Hammam said: I think he also said:" deliberately" -he should in fact find his abode in the Hell-Fire

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّثَبُّتِ فِي الْحَدِيثِ وَحُكْمِ كِتَابَةِ الْعِلْمِ
chapter.eng-name: Verification Of Hadith And The Ruling On Writing Down Knowledge
